pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exploration and Graphics for RivEr Trends // Statistics and graphics for streamflow history, water quality trends, and the statistical modeling algorithm: Weighted Regressions on Time, Discharge, and Season (WRTDS). The modeling method is introduced and discussed in Hirsch et al. (2010) doi:10.1111/j.1752-1688.2010.00482.x, and expanded in Hirsch and De Cicco (2015) doi:10.3133/tm4A10.
